sentences.en: " I am the Resurrection and the Life. "

sentences.cn: 昔日嫉妒心的再次出现

sentences.en: A typical scenario is to use ReRegisterForFinalize with Resurrection.
sentences.cn: ReRegisterForFinalize比较典型的是配合重生(Resurrection)的场合来用.

sentences.en: After the Mass of the Resurrection they would all go to the graveside service.
sentences.cn: 复活弥撒过后,他们还要去参加墓地葬礼.

sentences.en: But Joe's spirits had gone down almost beyond resurrection.
sentences.cn: 但是乔的情绪一落千丈.

sentences.en: Christians celebrate the resurrection of Christ from the death.
sentences.cn: 基督教徒们庆祝耶稣基督的复活.

sentences.en: I am the resurrection and the life; he who believes in me, though he die, yet shall he live.
sentences.cn: 我就是复活与生命, 谁相信我, 虽死犹生.

sentences.en: If perhaps I may attain to the out - resurrection from the dead.
sentences.cn: 11或者我可以达到那从死人中杰出的复活.

sentences.en: It contains the earliest documents extant on the life, teaching, crucifixion, and resurrection of Jesus.
sentences.cn: 它包含着现存的关于耶稣的生平, 教导, 受难和复活的最早文献.

sentences.en: Joe's spirits had gone down almost beyond resurrection.
sentences.cn: 齐埃的精神,几乎沮丧到了无可挽救的地步.

sentences.en: Some resurrection of domestic price pressure was apparent in the early part of the year.
sentences.cn: 年初,一些源自本地的价格压力明显重现.

sentences.en: The demystification of the Resurrection upsets many Christians.
sentences.cn: 把耶稣的复活作非神秘化解释使许多基督徒不快.

sentences.en: This resurrection will be their delivery as the man - child.
sentences.cn: 这个复活就是他们生为男孩子.

sentences.en: This was a grand feat and allows for resurrection and ascension today.
sentences.cn: 这是个伟大的壮举,它允许了今天的复活与提升.

sentences.en: When will the resurrection of the dead take place?
sentences.cn: 什么时候会出现死者复活?

trans.tran_cn: <宗>耶稣复活，使复活者，恢复使用，<宗>（最后审判日）所有死者的复活
trans.tran_en: a situation in which something old or forgotten returns or becomes important again
